# Getting Started

Welcome to the Toy App! This guide will help you get up and running quickly.

## Installation

Install the package using npm:

```bash
npm install toy-app
```

## Quick Start

Start the server with:

```bash
npm start
```

The server listens on port 3000 by default. You can override this with the `PORT` environment variable.

## Prerequisites

- Node.js 18 or higher
- npm 8 or higher

Once installed, visit `http://localhost:3000` to verify the server is running.
